description: This file provides utility functions for file synchronization and JSON settings persistence within the Utils namespace. It includes functions to synchronize file state with the filesystem and to persist JSON configurations to files using a file abstraction from WPEFramework and JSON value objects.

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes the contents of the specified file to disk by opening the file, flushing its buffers, and syncing with the filesystem.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persists a JSON value under a specified key to a file, managing file creation and updates, then ensuring the data is synchronized to disk.

ctags.name: persistJsonSettings
ctags.pattern: /^inline void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile, const string strKey, const JsonValue& jsVa/
ctags.signature: (const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
